feed.title: OpnForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.7.0: Improved Docker Setup, Stripe Payments, Partial submissions & others
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Stripe Payment by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/679
  • Partial submissions by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/705
  • Implement EnsureUserHasWorkspace Trait and Integrate into Controllers… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/741
  • Add LogicConfirmationModal Component and Integrate Logic Validation by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/742
  • Refactor form rendering by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/747
  • Enhance Form Submission Logic in OpenCompleteForm by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/752
  • UX Improvements for integrations by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/750
  • ESC-539 - Refactor SignatureInput Component for Consistency and Enhanced Logic by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/749
  • ESC-558 Apply refactor changes for edit submission by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/757
  • Fix quill and mentions by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/758
  • Integration pages from Notion by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/753
  • Fix form initialization by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/759
  • Slug customisation by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/755
  • Self hosted domain redirect by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/756
  • Enhance Docker Configuration and Health Checks by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/761

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.6.6...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.7.1. Improved docker setup further
New release for OpnForm: Fix docker cache busting issue + AI form generation
New release for OpnForm: v1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove the empty placeholder for typesWithoutPlaceholder by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/768
  • Sitemap integration by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/769
  • Version in self hosted by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/770
  • Fix form editor history

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.8.0: Public API release & bug fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ESC-575 If operator has no format and no expected_type, it means it doesn't n… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/767
  • Update dependencies and refactor CameraUpload component to use ZXing … by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/760
  • Add Tabler Icons and Refactor Form Components by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/771
  • ESC-590 - Fix UUID and Auto Increment ID Generation Logic in StoreFormSubmissio… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/774
  • Rich text Multiline placeholders by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/773
  • Secret input is now PRO Feature by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/778
  • Add the mentions feature on the Sender name of the email by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/780
  • Refactor OptionSelectorInput and InputWrapper Components for Improved… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/777
  • Custom domain restriction by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/785
  • ESC 602 - Fix Update Record by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/787
  • Refactor MatrixInput Component to Use Composition API and Improve Rea… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/792
  • Update OpenCompleteForm to Use Query String for URL Parameters by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/791
  • feat: Introduce Public API with Sanctum Token Authentication by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/788

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.7.3...v1.8.0
